1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import os
3 import rospy
4 import rospkg
5 import tf
6 from gazebo_msgs.srv import SpawnModel, SpawnModelRequest, SetModelState, SetLinkState
7 from gazebo_msgs.msg import ModelState, LinkState, Quaternion, Point, Pose
8 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
9 
10 
11 class IMUBoxStateManager():
12  def __init__(self, model_names, init_poses=None, sdf=True):
13  """
14  IMUBoxStateManager class.
15 
16  Arguments
17  ---------
18  `init_poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
19  [Pose(Position xyz, Orientation quaternion)]
20  `sdf: `bool`
21  launch from sdf or urdf
22  """
23  self.model_names = model_names
24  self.n = len(model_names)
25  self.sdf = sdf
26  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
27  self.imu_q = Quaternion()
28  self.position = Point(1, -1, 1)
29  init_poses = [Pose(position=self.position, orientation=self.imu_q)]
30  # rospy.Subscriber('imu0_pose', Quaternion, self.imu_callback)
31  rospy.Subscriber('imu/data_raw', Imu, self.imu_callback)
32 
33  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
34  if sdf:
35  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
36  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model', SpawnModel)
37  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imubox/model.sdf')
38  self.set_model_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_model_state', SetModelState)
39  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
40  xml_string = f.read().replace('\n', '')
41  else:
42  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model')
43  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model', SpawnModel)
44  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imu.urdf')
45  self.set_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_link_state', SetLinkState)
46  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
47  xml_string = f.read()
48 
49  if init_poses is None:
50  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
51  orientation = Quaternion(q[0], q[1], q[2], q[3])
52  position = Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
53  init_pose = Pose(position=position, orientation=orientation)
54  init_poses = [init_pose for i in range(self.n)]
55 
56  self.init_poses = init_poses
57  self.req = SpawnModelRequest()
58  self.req.model_xml = xml_string
59 
60  def imu_callback(self, data):
61  """
62  IMU callback.
63 
64  Arguments
65  ---------
66  `data`: `sensor_msgs.msg.Imu`
67  The `Imu` message, sed to get orientation.
68 
69  """
70  # self.imu_q = data
71  self.imu_q = data.orientation
72 
73  def spawn(self):
74  """
75  Spawns the model
76  """
77  for model_name, pose in zip(self.model_names, self.init_poses):
78  try:
79  self.req.model_name = model_name
80  self.req.initial_pose = pose
81  res = self.spawn_model(self.req)
82  print(res)
83  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
84  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
85 
86  def set_poses(self, names, poses):
87  """
88  Sets the poses of the IMU.
89 
90  Arguments
91  ---------
92  `names`: `List[str]`
93  The names of the IMUs
94 
95  `poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
96  The poses of the IMUs
97  """
98  for name, pose in zip(names, poses):
99  self.set_pose(name, pose)
100 
101  def set_pose(self, name, pose=None):
102  """
103  Sets a pose of an IMU
104 
105  Arguments
106  ---------
107  `name`: `str`
108  The name of the IMU
109 
110  `poses`: `geometry_msgs.msg.Pose`
111  The pose of the IMU
112  """
113  pose = Pose(position=self.position, orientation=self.imu_q)
114 
115  if self.sdf:
116  try:
117  state_msg = ModelState()
118  state_msg.model_name = name
119  state_msg.pose = pose
120  state_msg.reference_frame = "world"
121  res = self.set_model_state(state_msg)
122  print(res)
123  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
124  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
125  else:
126  try:
127  link_msg = LinkState()
128  link_msg.link_name = name
129  link_msg.pose = pose
130  link_msg.reference_frame = "world"
131  res = self.set_link_state(state_msg)
132  print(res)
133  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
134  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
135 
136 
137 if __name__ == '__main__':
138  rospy.init_node("set_estimated_imu_positions")
139 
140  model_names = ['imu5']
141  state_manager = IMUBoxStateManager(model_names)
142  state_manager.spawn()
143 
144  r = rospy.Rate(30)
145 
146  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
147  state_manager.set_pose(model_names[0])
148  r.sleep()
